title: teddybear
author: teddybear
content: Solana quickly became a favorite among many investors, Does it became the next Ethereum

comments.author: ItsNotSean
comments.body: Solana is a VC-funded business, while Ethereum is more akin to a protocol, a la Bitcoin.If you put any stock in Satoshi's vision of cryptocurrency supporting decentralization, censorship resistance, and freedom, etc., there is no comparison between Solana (or Ripple, Binance, etc.) and EthereumSolana is conventional finance with a "crypto" veneer. Ethereum was a good-faith, second step expanding upon Satoshi's vision.

comments.author: CuriousGeorge
comments.body: Venture capital who backed it is making it become hyped. Solana was an ordinary blockchain. No reason for this blockchain to be the next ethereum and you shall stop with this kind of gimmick. A blockchain will not kill another blockchain. You must know that if what you have been talking above was not even true. Solana has become alternative blockchain for ethereum and this is the fact that happened in the market. There's no need to call ethereum killer anymore.

comments.body: Solana has become the best alternative blockchain for ethereum although if that was always getting shortage that makes the blockchaing gets down. Why are you looking for next ethereum if solana has reached a very big market cap as a blockchain? I think that it's actually clueless. Solana was a major blockchain actively used by so many dapps and that's the same like ethereum. Solana was also first layer blockchain.

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I used to think it could but the network has had so much interruption & too many problems. I just don’t think it’s possible now. Investor confidence must be at a huge low regarding SOL. I do own some @ I want to think it could be an ETH killer but no, not for me.

comments.author: KellyHands
comments.body: One of the reasons why I consider Solana a good buy was because of the fact that several projects were launched on the platform and that gave me a reason to hold some of it. Solana is a great project, but it's not to be compared with ethereum, owing to the fact that ethereum has come a long way as has the support of a larger community.

comments.body: I don't think that will happen and the Solana network sometimes has this problem not sure it will precede Ethereum but as an alternative network there are still many who use this network but not only Solana there are many other networks that I think are more above Solana and still Ethereum is wrong one of the best because lots of coins are in this network Ethereum should still be on top.Do you still believe in Solana and its ecosystem? I think this also needs to be supported but it doesn't need to be compared to the next Ethereum because it's not possible.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Solana, Polkadot, Near won't be a next Ethereum. It is like Ethereum won't be a next Bitcoin.Technologies are different and they are blockchain-based projects that are created and grown at very different periods of blockchain industry and cryptocurrency market.New projects will run marketing and their communities will shill their projects as next big things. Fact is bitterly different. Even a good project will have ups and downs, will be tested by market and hackers. Lot of challenge for any new project bht to conclude, Solana won't be a next Ethereum, never be.

comments.body: Without layer 2, no chance for Sol to complete with ETH or even try to mimic the next ETH. This isn't taking into account another thing that ETH has miles ahead of Sol in every category.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Considering one of Ethereum's killers is Solana.  There are too many of them who compete with Ethereum but I think IMO, Ethereum is still a unique one. It's far from its other Ethereum using PoW while Solana uses PoH, though when it comes to fee, those Ethereum killers including Solana really have an advantage.When it comes to investment, I think it would be the best if you'll choose them all, Solana has been proven that shows significant growth last year and it could be next year but I don't it will surpass Ethereum.  There's should be more technical innovation on Ethereum than these Ethereum killers which I believe.
